lead_paragraph: Asia got off to a solid start in its defense of the Royal Trophy in Thailand on Friday, winning two and tying one of the foursomes matches to take a 2 1/2 to 1 1/2 lead over two-time winner Europe.
snippet: Asia got off to a solid start in its defense of the Royal Trophy in Thailand on Friday, winning two and tying one of the foursomes matches to take a 2 1/2 to 1 1/2 lead over two-time winner Europe.
